comments.creator: 935c@itsynergy.co.uk
comments.author: 935c@itsynergy.co.uk
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:5.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0.1
Build ID: 20110707182747

Steps to reproduce:

(On Mac OS X 10.7, Lion)
Setup Message Filter :
- Match all
- From is me@example.com
- Forward Message to you@example.com
- Delete message

Initial run processed 300 messages, almost 100% plain text


Actual results:

Activity manager showed nothing.  Had to watch sent items to determine progress.


Expected results:

Activity manager should show what's going on.
